message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product I think you'd be interested in!  I'm starting the offer at $150.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can find something similar elsewhere for $120. I'm willing to pay up to $130 for your product if you're interested.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm not quite there yet.  Given the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $140.  Let's see if we can make this work.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to lower the price. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay up to $135 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
